org.apache.distributedlog.api

Interface LogWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Abortable, AutoCloseable, Closeable

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface LogWriter
extends Closeable, Abortable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long commit()
      Flush and sync all data that is ready to be flush flush() into underlying persistent store.
      long flush()
      All data that has been written to the stream so far will be sent to persistent storage.
      void markEndOfStream()
      Flushes all the data up to this point, adds the end of stream marker and marks the stream as read-only in the metadata.
      void write(LogRecord record)
      Write a log record to the stream.
      int writeBulk(List<LogRecord> records)
      Deprecated. 

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.distributedlog.io.Abortable

        abort

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(LogRecord record)
    throws IOException
        Write a log record to the stream.
        Parameters:
        record - single log record
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeBulk

        @Deprecated
int writeBulk(List<LogRecord> records)
                   throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Write a list of log records to the stream.
        Parameters:
        records - list of log records
        Throws:
        IOException

      • flush

        long flush()
    throws IOException
        All data that has been written to the stream so far will be sent to persistent storage. The transmission is asynchronous and new data can be still written to the stream while flushing is performed.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • commit

        long commit()
     throws IOException
        Flush and sync all data that is ready to be flush flush() into underlying persistent store.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • markEndOfStream

        void markEndOfStream()
              throws IOException
        Flushes all the data up to this point, adds the end of stream marker and marks the stream as read-only in the metadata. No appends to the stream will be allowed after this point
        Throws:
        IOException
